original_title: Richard Thompson: Across a Crowded Room - Live in Concert 1985
overview: Richard Thompson (Ex-Fairport Convention guitarist) performs at Barrymore's in Ottawa, Canada. Songs Include: Fire in the Engine Room/She Twists the Knife/Shoot Out the Lights/You Don't Say/Wall of Death/Little Blue Number/When the Spell Is Broken/Did She Jump or Was She Pushed/Wrong Heartbeat/Summer Rain/For Shame of Doing Wrong/Bright Lights Tonight/Nearly in Love/Love in A Faithless Country/Ain't Gonna Drag My Feet No More/Tear-Stained Letter/Living with a Skull and Cross Bone/Withered and Died.
title: Richard Thompson: Across a Crowded Room - Live in Concert 1985
